name: Moon Jump (Holonet, yousayrandy)
description:
In this 2D platformer, you will jump between the earth & moon as you complete the stages! (There are no hidden metaphors here ) Instructions:

Your abilities are the jump, and the moon jump.

You will encounter obstacles in this game, and you won't be able to pass them unless you jump to the moon in order to get around them!

You will have limited time on the moon because, you know, there's no air there.

You can moon jump in the air.

 

Controls (Pause menu in game): Keyboard:

Movement:  Either WASD or Arrow keys

Jump:  Period (> .)

Moon Jump: Comma (< ,)

Pause/Unpause:  Esc

 

Gamepad:

(Please note that testing showed issues w/ PS4 controllers.  Typical X-box and/or generic gamepads should work fine)

Movement:  D-pad or left stick (D-pad recommended)

Jump:  "South" button

Moon Jump:  "West" button

Pause/Unpause:  Start button

CREDITS:

Background music:  Gioachino Rossini's William Tell Overture (1829), performed by the United States Marine Corps Band 
https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:Gioachino_Rossini,_William_Tell_Overture...
{{PD-US}}
